instructions: Put the charger on the table cloth
put the fork on the left of the charger with its tines facing upwards.
Put the fork on the left of the charger with its tines facing upwards.
place a salad fork on the left of the charger and a dinner knife on the right.
Place a salad fork on the left of the first fork.
Place another dinner knife and a soup soup on the right of the charger.
place a soup spoon next to the dinner knife with its bowl facing the top.
Place a desert spoon above the charger with its bowl facing left.
Place a desert fork below the desert spoon with its tines facing right.
Place a bread plate to the left of the charger above the forks.
Place a butter knife cross on the bread place with its blade pointing downwards.
Place a water glass on the right of the charger above the knives and the soup spoon.
